text: Beka Bitsadze (born March 24, 1991) is a Georgian rugby union player. His position is number 8, and he currently plays for Locomotive in the Georgia Championship and the Georgia national team.http://en.espn.co.uk/scrum/rugby/player/165557.html ==References== ==External links== http://www.itsrugby.fr/joueur-23426.html Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby union players from Georgia (country) Category:Rugby union number eights Category:Georgia international rugby union players
title: Beka Bitsadze
